mapper.sql: SELECT B.ID AS BLACKLIST_ID, B.CREATED_AT AS BLACKLIST_CREATED_AT, B.MODIFIED_AT AS BLACKLIST_MODIFIED_AT, U.PASSWORD AS USER_PASSWORD, U.AUTHORITIES AS USER_AUTHORITIES, U.DATE_OF_BIRTDAY AS USER_DATE_OF_BIRTDAY, U.STATUS AS USER_STATUS, U.MODIFIED_AT AS USER_MODIFIED_AT, U.LAST_NAME AS USER_LAST_NAME, U.SETTING AS USER_SETTING, U.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL, U.ENABLED AS USER_ENABLED, U.USERNAME AS USER_USERNAME, U.VERIFIED AS USER_VERIFIED, U.FIRST_NAME AS USER_FIRST_NAME, U.ID AS USER_ID, U.CREATED_AT AS USER_CREATED_AT, C.ID AS CHAT_ID, C.CREATED_AT AS CHAT_CREATED_AT, C.USERS AS CHAT_USERS, C.NAME AS CHAT_NAME, C.MODIFIED_AT AS CHAT_MODIFIED_AT FROM argon.BLACKLIST B LEFT JOIN argon.USERS U ON B.USER_ID = U.ID LEFT JOIN argon.CHATS C ON B.CHAT_ID = C.ID
